      class Stage extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • adjustedTimes
          Map<Integer,LocalTime> adjustedTimes

          Map<Integer,Checkpoint> checkpoints

          String description

          int id
          The unique id of a stage
        • length
          double length
          The length (in km) of a stage
        • mountainCheckpointIds
          ArrayList<Integer> mountainCheckpointIds
          A list of mountainCheckpointIds
        • mountainCheckpointRef
          ArrayList<Integer> mountainCheckpointRef
          A list of reference indexes for mountainCheckpoints

          Map<Integer,Integer> mountainPoints
          A map with riderIds as keys and their mountain points as values
        • name
          String name
          The name of a stage
        • race
          Race race
          The race a stage belongs to
        • riderPositions
          ArrayList<Integer> riderPositions
          A list of riderIds ordered by finish position
        • riderTimes
          Map<Integer,LocalTime[]> riderTimes
          A map with riderIds as keys and their times for all checkpoints as values
        • sprintCheckpointIds
          ArrayList<Integer> sprintCheckpointIds
          A list of sprintCheckpointIds
        • sprintCheckpointRef
          ArrayList<Integer> sprintCheckpointRef
          A list of reference indexes for sprintCheckpoints
        • sprinterPoints
          Map<Integer,Integer> sprinterPoints
          A map with riderIds as keys and their sprint points as values
        • startTime
          LocalDateTime startTime
        • state
          String state
          The state a race is currently in
        • type
          StageType type
          The type of a stage
